abstract: Steven P. Jobs, who has been on medical leave, reportedly underwent a liver transplant two months ago at a hospital in Tennessee.
snippet: Steven P. Jobs, who has been on medical leave, reportedly underwent a liver transplant two months ago at a hospital in Tennessee.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Apple, Steven P. Jobs, who has been on a medical leave since January for treatment of what he called a hormone imbalance, underwent a liver transplant two months ago at a hospital in Tennessee, The Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday.

headline.main: Apple Chief Reportedly Had Liver Transplant
headline.print_headline: Apple’s Chief Reportedly Had a Liver Transplant
